answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!Uncontrolled diabetes can cause all the symptoms you mentioned due to involvement of peripheral nerves, increasing eye pressure, affecting retinal etc.  However there are many other reasons too. Further information can be provided if we have more details. Please consult a doctor.Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: are there any blood sugar diseases that can cause ear and eye pain/pressure. accompanied with slight weight gain/ facial swelling.
title: ear and head pain/swelling, weight gain
